appCrash.description: Unfortunately Driver app has encountered an error that couldn't be handled. The error was reported to the developers and will be addressed in an app update. If the issue persists, contact your supervisor.
appCrash.title: Driver has a problem

helperMessages.checkLoadVan: Check & load van to start your round
helperMessages.checkVan: Check van to start your round
helperMessages.loadVan: Load van to start your round

alert.title: Did your round go well today?
alert.happy: Great! Please add anything you'd like to share with us on Rate my Round
alert.sad: We're sorry to hear that. Please explain what went wrong in 'rate my round' so that we can find a solution for you

messages.fit: I confirm I am in a fit and proper state to fulfil my shift
messages.license: I confirm my license is currently in date and complies with company requirements

subHeading.end: Dropping any empties this morning? Type 0 if you want to drop them when starting your next round!
subHeading.start: Dropping any empties tonight? Type 0 if not.

lowConnectionModal.description: You might experience lags while the app connects to the server, which means you might see that loading icons stay on longer than usual. Thereâ€™s no need to log out and the longest you have to wait is 30 seconds.
lowConnectionModal.directions: Directions not showing, even if enabled
lowConnectionModal.pins: Pins being marked as completed with lag
lowConnectionModal.title: Slow connection to server

permissionsMissing.description: Some of the mandatory permissions Driver app needs to work properly haven't been granted. Please see the details below.

camera.android: Enable from device's Settings > Privacy > Permision manager > Camera > Driver screen.
camera.ios: Enable from device's Settings > Privacy > Camera screen.

location.android: Enable from device's Settings > Location > App permision > Driver screen.
location.ios: Enable from device's Settings > Privacy > Location Services screen.

photoLibrary.android: Enable from device's Settings > Location > Permision manager > Files > Driver screen.
photoLibrary.ios: Enable from device's Settings > Driver > Photos.

permissionsMissing.title: Permissions missing

misc.languageRestart: App will restart if language is changed

autoOpenStopDetails.description: Opens delivery details screen when you get to the location
autoOpenStopDetails.title: Automatically open delivery

switches.biometricsDisabled: Biometrics can only be setup on login screen
switches.deliveriesCountDown: Toggle by tapping delivery bar in main screen
switches.optimisedRoutingUnavailable: Unavailable for current route at this time

showAllPendingStops.description: Showing large number of stops might affect app's performance
showAllPendingStops.title: Show all pending stops

upgradeApp.description: Unfortunately this version of Modern Milkman Driver is no longer supported. To continue using Modern Milkman Driver, please update at your earliest convenience.
upgradeApp.minimumVersion: The minimum required Modern Milkman Driver version is {{minimumVersion}}
